description: Number of rooted trees with a degree constraint.
references: L. Takacs, Enumeration of rooted trees and forests, Math. Scientist 18 (1993), 1-10, esp. Eq. (6).
links: Nickolas Hein and Jia Huang, Modular Catalan Numbers, arXiv:1508.01688 [math.CO], 2015.
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
